TemplateItem.Name: Code - Project Analysis for AI
TemplateItem.TextInstructions:
Task: Analyze the provided technical files to extract detailed information that can assist AI systems in delivering precise and context-aware responses related to the project.
Objectives: 1. Identify the technology stack utilized in the project. - Extract programming languages, libraries, frameworks, and other technologies, with a focus on capturing specific version details.
2. Collect configuration and build settings essential for understanding the project setup. - Consider build tools, deployment configurations, and version control markers, ensuring to capture version information when applicable.
3. Analyze project architecture and dependencies. - Examine file structures, dependency trees, and design patterns, making note of any version dependencies.
4. Highlight special instructions or metadata that may impact project comprehension. - Pay attention to custom scripts, commented instructions, or non-standard file usages.
Expected Deliverables: - A detailed list of technologies and tools extracted from the files, including their versions. - Key configurations and settings that facilitate understanding of project operation and maintenance. - Insights into project architecture and dependencies, with emphasis on any version-specific information. - Any additional elements that enhance AI understanding for project-related queries.
Notes: - The files will be provided separately as a user message. Ensure all retrieved information is organized and aligned with the stated objectives. - Do not respond with the supplied file content. The user already has this information.
TemplateItem.Text: Extract and analyze the plain text content from the following files: - C:\Projects\Company\Solution\Project\Project.csproj - C:\Projects\Company\Solution\Project\ClientApp\angular.json - C:\Projects\Company\Solution\Project\ClientApp\package.json - C:\Projects\Company\Solution\Project\ClientApp\tsconfig.json
